We are now using Firefox v3.5. A minor issue with Night Impression and Firefox is the combo drop down. The color of the URL addresses display in a blue color which does not present well against a black background. As the pre-light state show these items as desired this issue has been deferred.

The tabs of Firefox have been themed to mimic the `GtkNotebook` tabs as displayed by Bluefish.
